prompt: Photorealistic medium shot of a professional art appraiser, middle-aged woman with glasses, meticulously examining the brushstrokes of an antique oil painting using a magnifying glass in a well-lit gallery setting. Soft, directional lighting highlights the texture of the canvas and the appraiser's focused expression. The background shows blurred outlines of other framed artworks. Composition emphasizes the detailed inspection process, with the appraiser slightly off-center to the left, and the painting occupying the right two-thirds of the frame. Style: Professional, detailed, shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-near-me-image-1.png

prompt: Photorealistic wide shot capturing an art appraiser's consultation with a client in a bright, modern office. The appraiser, a man in a suit, gestures towards a contemporary sculpture placed on a large desk between him and the attentive client. Large windows behind them reveal a subtle cityscape view. The scene is bathed in natural daylight, creating a clean, professional atmosphere. Composition balances the two figures, the artwork, and the office environment across the widescreen frame. Style: Corporate, clean, realistic lighting. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-near-me-image-2.png

prompt: Photorealistic image focusing on the research aspect of art appraisal. An overhead slightly angled shot of an appraiser's desk, cluttered yet organized. Visible items include open art history books, auction catalogs, a laptop displaying artwork database results, a magnifying loupe, white gloves, and a small antique ceramic vase being researched. Warm task lighting from a desk lamp illuminates the central area. Composition uses the desk surface as the main plane, arranging elements horizontally. Style: Detailed, scholarly, warm lighting. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-near-me-image-3.png

prompt: Photorealistic medium wide shot of an art appraiser working on-site in an elegant, older home. The appraiser, wearing professional attire and gloves, carefully inspects a large, ornate silver serving tray on a mahogany dining table. Sunlight streams through a nearby bay window, creating dramatic highlights and casting long shadows. Other antique items are subtly visible in the background, suggesting an estate appraisal. Composition captures the appraiser, the object, and the atmospheric interior. Style: Atmospheric, realistic, dramatic natural light. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-near-me-image-4.png

prompt: Photorealistic close-up shot focusing on the hands of an art appraiser holding a formal, signed appraisal document, presenting it towards the viewer (or an out-of-focus client). One hand wears a white glove and rests near a small, valuable-looking artifact (e.g., jade figurine or antique watch) on a polished surface. The background is softly blurred, suggesting a professional office or gallery environment. Lighting is soft and even, emphasizing the texture of the paper and the object. Composition places the document and hands centrally, with the artifact providing context to the side. Style: Professional, focused, clean, symbolic of final valuation. --ar 16:9
name: art-appraiser-near-me-image-5.png
